oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Hallelujah!" cast
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Hallelujah!"; African Americans; Woodruff, Georgia; film; portraits;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Informal photograph of the "Hallelujah!" cast. Mrs. Woodruff is fourth from the right.
